text: The'Late Late Show'host and his theater troupe, including a surprise appearance from Josh Gad, performed songs from'Evita,'' Cats,'' Phantom of the Opera'and'Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat.'James Corden has brought ` ` Crosswalk the Musical'' to London. While shooting The Late Late Show across the pond, Corden staged an Andrew Lloyd Webber - themed edition of the segment, featuring songs from some of the composer's best - known musicals. ` ` So we're back. We're on home shores,'' says Corden, introducing the segment. ` ` There are really only two events that everyone in Britain circled on their calendar this year.
